languages.text: "Для начала удалим... лишнее". {n}В руках Тервантьяса возникает несколько орудий смерти с клинками разных размеров, толщины и кривизны. Улыбаясь, словно змея, он вкрадчиво обращается к Джай:{/n} "Какой ты выбираешь?"

"First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"
languages.original_text: "Для начала удалим... лишнее". {n}В руках Тервантьяса возникает несколько орудий смерти с клинками разных размеров, толщины и кривизны. Улыбаясь, словно змея, он вкрадчиво обращается к Джай:{/n} "Какой ты выбираешь?"

traits.locale_text: "First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

"First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

"First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

"First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

"First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

languages.text: 「まずは…不必要な部分を取り除くとしよう」{n}テルヴァンティアスの手には、長さ、太さ、曲がり具合の異なる刃のついた死の道具がいくつも現れる。彼は歯をむき出しにして、挑発的な声でジェイに話しかける。{/n}「さて、どれがいいかな？」
languages.original_text: "First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

traits.locale_text: 「まずは…不必要な部分を取り除くとしよう」{n}テルヴァンティアスの手には、長さ、太さ、曲がり具合の異なる刃のついた死の道具がいくつも現れる。彼は歯をむき出しにして、挑発的な声でジェイに話しかける。{/n}「さて、どれがいいかな？」

languages.text: “首先，我们先去掉……多余的部分吧。”{n}特万提亚斯手中出现了许多见长度不同、形态各异的杀人工具。他露出尖牙，以充满暗示的语气对婕伊开了口。{/n}“你想选哪个？”
languages.original_text: "First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

traits.locale_text: “首先，我们先去掉……多余的部分吧。”{n}特万提亚斯手中出现了许多见长度不同、形态各异的杀人工具。他露出尖牙，以充满暗示的语气对婕伊开了口。{/n}“你想选哪个？”

languages.text: « Tout d'abord, retirons les parties... redondantes. » {n}Divers instruments mortels aux lames de différentes largeurs, épaisseurs et courbures apparaissent entre les mains de Tervantias. Il serre la mâchoire et s'adresse à Jae d'une voix pleine de sous-entendus :{/n} « Laquelle choisissez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

traits.locale_text: « Tout d'abord, retirons les parties... redondantes. » {n}Divers instruments mortels aux lames de différentes largeurs, épaisseurs et courbures apparaissent entre les mains de Tervantias. Il serre la mâchoire et s'adresse à Jae d'une voix pleine de sous-entendus :{/n} « Laquelle choisissez-vous ? »

languages.text: «Empecemos por eliminar las... partes redundantes». {n}Varios instrumentos letales con hojas de diferentes longitudes, grosores y curvaturas aparecen en manos de Tervantias, que enseña los dientes y se dirige a Jae en tono insinuante:{/n} «¿Cuál eliges?».
languages.original_text: "First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

traits.locale_text: «Empecemos por eliminar las... partes redundantes». {n}Varios instrumentos letales con hojas de diferentes longitudes, grosores y curvaturas aparecen en manos de Tervantias, que enseña los dientes y se dirige a Jae en tono insinuante:{/n} «¿Cuál eliges?».

languages.text: "Entfernen wir zuerst ... die überflüssigen Teile." {n}Mehrere Gerätschaften des Todes mit Klingen von unterschiedlicher Länge, Breite und Krümmung erscheinen in Tervantias Händen. Er entblößt seine Zähne und fragt Jae mit zuckersüßer Stimme:{/n} "Welcher darf es sein?"
languages.original_text: "First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

traits.locale_text: "Entfernen wir zuerst ... die überflüssigen Teile." {n}Mehrere Gerätschaften des Todes mit Klingen von unterschiedlicher Länge, Breite und Krümmung erscheinen in Tervantias Händen. Er entblößt seine Zähne und fragt Jae mit zuckersüßer Stimme:{/n} "Welcher darf es sein?"

languages.text: "Öncelikle... Gereksiz parçalardan kurtulalım." {n}Tervantias'ın ellerinde; keskin yüzlerinin uzunlukları, kalınlıkları ve kıvrımları birbirinden farklı, çeşitli ölüm gereçleri ortaya çıkıyor. Gülümseyişiyle dişleri ortaya çıkıyor, imalı bir tonla Jae ile konuşuyor.{/n} "Hangisini seçiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "First, let us remove the... redundant parts." {n}Several instruments of death with blades of varying length, thickness, and curvature appear in Tervantias's hands. He bares his teeth and addresses Jae in an insinuating voice,{/n} "Which one do you choose?"

traits.locale_text: "Öncelikle... Gereksiz parçalardan kurtulalım." {n}Tervantias'ın ellerinde, keskin yüzlerinin uzunlukları, kalınlıkları ve kıvrımları birbirinden farklı, çeşitli ölüm gereçleri ortaya çıkıyor. Gülümsemesi dişlerini ortaya çıkarıyor ve Jae'la imalı bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Hangisini seçiyorsun?"
